name: Adyen

card_interchange.note: Interchange++ varies by card type and region

todos: Adyen uses Interchange++ pricing which is variable - actual fees depend on card type, issuing bank, and region
US card rate shown is estimated: $0.13 (Adyen fee) + interchange + scheme fees + 0.60% (Adyen markup)
Interchange fees typically range from 1.5% to 3.5% depending on card type
No setup or monthly fees for payment processing
For accurate calculations, users should consult Adyen's payment method explorer or their account
